title: Permamently banned after i didnt played four months. Didnt get explanation why either.
body:
So four months ago i stopped playing league for a while, you know, to clear my head and be as much as positive as i can be. Yesterday i tried to log in and play couple of games, to see what changed bout the game, when suddenly a message popped up saying my account was permamently suspended. I got really confused, because this was my first time ever an account of mine is getting perma ban. The message said that there will be an expanation why i was banned at my email adress. Went there, checked every "Riot Games" named mail, but didnt found anything related to this case. I really dont know what i was banned for, but i can say that i was a very positive person really. Never got upset without a actual reason. Played the game for fun. Yea you read that right xD. I put a lot of effort in the game. That was my first time i got really into a game. Created my account back at 2015 and played it ever since. Anticipated in every event (The Bilgewater one was my favorite :D) and overall had lot of fun, and i still do. This is my only account which i am fully dedicated to, and to be taken away from me is a pretty bad experience. If i really go banned forever, at least i need some explanation why. I can tell everything about the account. Dates, email, in game screenshots, riot points reciepts (lot of them) and everything you guys need. Please, i need someone's help on this.

Yours sincerely,

PowRevAce

replies.body:
If you didn't receive an email with details of your ban, be sure to [send a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in and you can discuss your case with an agent. 
Unfortunately due to this being an account specific inquiry we are unable to help you further on the boards. 

When submitting a ticket follow the following guidelines to ensure the quickest and smoothest experience:

>Please create a max of 1 ticket about this issue, and do not try to add any information afterwards/submit multiple as it will bump it to the back of the queue. It can take up to 7 business days for them to get back to you (although majority of tickets are answered within 48 hours), so be patient

You probably got hacked, and then the hacker either cheated or was toxic on your account. Happens a lot lately it seems.
Contact support to get your account back.
You should have recieved an email explaining the ban. Be sure to check junk as it goes in there sometimes.
